english.segment1: I hate to be, to be the one. Who's given up. And feels that all our hope is gone. But what I thought was a miracle. Just turned into the same old. Problem that it was
english.segment2: She longs for better days. She's always been afraid
english.segment3: It's a shame, oh it's a shame. That you are throwing your whole life away. It's a shame, oh it's a shame. I wonder if you're ever going to change. It's a shame
english.segment4: Ever since I can recall. She has been so afraid. Of you losing it all. What do you want. Do you even know. And is it worth the pain. We all have to endure
english.segment5: She longs for better days. She's always been afraid
english.segment6: You left her without leaving. You hit her without swinging
english.segment7: You took away without giving a thing. Except for pain and sorrow. I'm praying that tomorrow. You will open up your eyes and see
